items.sentence: The detective disguised himself as an old gentleman.
They have a very good curriculum at that university.
The dirty boy turned out to be a prince in disguise.
I don't understand why Mary doesn't love me anymore.
I'm a bit drunk. I think I should stop drinking now.
I'm very grateful for everything you've done for me.
You're going to turn a lot of heads with that dress.
Tom is fanning Mary with a large piece of cardboard.
We had to fumigate our house to get rid of termites.
I had no idea that you knew how to play the bassoon.
Tom's guardian angel must've been watching over him.
Tom knew better than to tell Mary that kind of joke.
You almost gave me a heart attack when you did that.
I hope that all three of us can have lunch together.
We went to a matinee showing because it was cheaper.
Tom asked Mary if he could borrow one of her spades.
I've been told that the museum is closed on Mondays.
It would be best if you wrote the letter right away.
That probably didn't happen the way Tom said it did.
I don't think that Tom knows why Mary is here today.
